title: Stage Lv10-S18
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Alright, let's meet each other halfway.
Here's what we'll do. We'll both give up a little.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Alright, let's meet each other halfway.

sentences.kr: 그럼 이렇게 하자. 둘 다 조금씩 포기하는 거야.
sentences.en: Here's what we'll do. We'll both give up a little.

sentences.kr: 완전히 내 방식대로 할 순 없겠지만, 어느 정도는...
sentences.en: I can't do it completely my way, but to some extent...
If you compromise, I'll compromise too.

sentences.kr: 이번엔 네 말을 들을게. 다음엔 내 의견도 고려해 줘.
sentences.en: I'll go with your idea this time. Next time, consider mine too.

sentences.kr: 완벽하진 않지만, 일단 이것부터 시작해 보자.
sentences.en: It's not perfect, but let's start with this for now.

sentences.kr: 최선은 아니지만, 현실적으로는 이게 나을 것 같아.
sentences.en: It's not ideal, but realistically, this seems better.
It's not as much as I wanted, but it's still okay.
